summary: The customer contacted the agent to report dissatisfaction with their Contoso Wireless internet product, which had slow and unreliable speeds. The agent apologized for the inconvenience and asked for the customer's account information in order to investigate further. After gathering more information about the type of product purchased, the agent offered to investigate why the connection was so unreliable and promised to update the customer soon. The agent also let the customer know that they could reach out again if there was anything else they needed help with.
